#model.add(Flatten())
model.add(Dense(6,kernel_regularizer=regularizers.l2(0.001)))
#model.add(BatchNormalization())
#model.add(Activation('relu'))
#model.add(BatchNormalization())
#model.add(Dense(256,activation='relu'))
#model.add(Dense(256,activation='relu'))
#model.add(BatchNormalization())
model.add(Activation('tanh'))
model.add(Dropout(0.39))
model.add(Dense(5,kernel_regularizer=regularizers.l2(0.001)))
model.add(Activation('relu'))
model.add(Dropout(0.39))
#model.add(Dense(6))
##model.add(BatchNormalization())
#model.add(Activation('relu'))
#model.add(BatchNormalization())
#model.add(Activation('relu'))
#model.add(Dropout(0.39))
#model.add(Dense(128,activation='relu'))
#model.add(Dropout(0.4))
#model.add(Dense(64,activation='relu'))
#model.add(Dropout(0.5))
#model.add(Dense(64,activation='relu'))
#model.add(Dropout(0.5))
#model.add(Dense(32,activation='relu'))
#model.add(Dropout(0.5))
model.add(Flatten())
model.add(Dense(2,activation='softmax'))
print("Resumo do modelo")
print(model.summary())
model.compile(loss=keras.losses.categorical_crossentropy,
          optimizer=keras.optimizers.SGD(lr=0.0035,nesterov=True),
          metrics=['accuracy','mse'])
train_batches = ImageDataGenerator(rescale=1./255).flow_from_directory(train_path,target_size=target_size,color_mode='rgb',classes=['ad','nc'],batch_size=20)
valid_batches = ImageDataGenerator(rescale=1./255).flow_from_directory(valid_path,target_size=target_size,color_mode='rgb',classes=['ad','nc'],batch_size=10)
test_batches = ImageDataGenerator(rescale=1./255).flow_from_directory(test_path,target_size=target_size,color_mode='rgb',classes=['ad','nc'],shuffle=False,batch_size=5)
NUMERO_EPOCHS = 60
